paragraphs: The 6500P Series HF LCR Meters are precision instruments designed to meet the varied needs of manufacturing and testing with a focus on high frequency component analysis. With a wide range of frequency specifications, these meters are tailored to offer the best match for application requirements and budget constraints. Known for their high measurement accuracy and versatility, the 6500P series is an ideal solution for tasks requiring detailed component evaluation and characterization.

features.title: High Measurement Accuracy
features.description: Outstanding basic accuracy for capacitance, inductance, and impedance at ±0.05%, with dissipation factor accuracy at ±0.0005 and quality factor accuracy also at ±0.05%

features.title: Variable Drive and Bias Levels
features.description: AC drive levels up to 1Vrms or 20mArms and DC bias options of 0 to +40V dc bias voltage and 0 to +100mA dc bias current, with a further option for -40V to +40V dc bias voltage, allowing for component evaluation under realistic operating conditions

features.title: Comprehensive Measurement Capabilities
features.description: Capable of characterizing components across a frequency range from 20 Hz to 120 MHz, with models available from 5MHz (6505P) to 120MHz (65120P)

features.title: Intuitive Operation
features.description: Features a large 8.4" VGA color TFT touch screen for ease of use, complemented by clear graphic displays that aid measurement interpretation

features.title: Extensive Connectivity Options
features.description: Includes GPIB and Ethernet interfaces for external control and data output, facilitating integration into various test environments. Also offers the flexibility of keyboard and mouse control via PS/2 or USB connections

features.title: Data Management
features.description: Enables storage of measurement and setup data via Ethernet or USB flash memory, with capacity for up to 20 setups stored locally for each mode

features.title: Safety Features
features.description: Incorporates protection against charged capacitors to prevent damage and ensure instrument longevity

features.title: Versatile Component Connections
features.description: Equipped with four front panel BNC connectors for three or four terminal connections, along with fixtures for both leaded and surface mount devices

specifications.heading: Measurement Speeds
content: Up to 20 measurements per second for test frequencies ≥100 Hz

specifications.heading: Accuracy
specifications.note: Accuracy depends on frequency, drive level and impedance

specifications.heading: DC Bias Current (Option)
content: /D1 0 to +100mA dc bias current and 0 to +40V dc bias voltage

specifications.heading: Binning (Option)
content: 10 bins with absolute and percentage limits
list: /B1 (Non-isolated) Common 0V Bin outputs 0 to 5V (normal) with >10mA current sink capability
/B2 (isolated) Common 24V input outputs 0 to 24V with >10mA current source capability

specifications.heading: Display
content: 8.4" VGA (650 x 480) color TFT with touch panel

specifications.heading: GPIB Interface
content: External instrument control 24 pin IEEE 488 connector
